title: Kimberley D. Lemmen
text:
About me
I am an experimental evolutionary ecologist who studies how ecosystem context impacts the ecology and evolution of species interactions.




I am currently a postdoctoral researcher in the Biotic Responses to Environmental Change at the University of Zurich led by Dr.Â Frank Pennekamp.
This website is currently a work in progress. For an overview of my publications see my Google Scholar.
